data.eml:eml: Clarification of the identity of Helicina mediana Gassies, 1870 from New Caledonia (Gastropoda, Neritimorpha, Helicinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Richling, Ira (2017): Clarification of the identity of Helicina mediana Gassies, 1870 from New Caledonia (Gastropoda, Neritimorpha, Helicinidae). Zootaxa 4247 (1): 65-67, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4247.1.8
